1.0.0.name: wordpress/blogfolio
1.0.0.description: A lightweight HTML5 theme with responsive design for mobile to large displays, geared towards portfolio-based blogging. Features include a homepage template with tiled blog posts, and 5 widget areas. Make it yours with a custom menu, header image, and background. Extend it through the numerous action hooks and custom template fragment system.
